Plot: in claymation, we see the story of achilles. he loves patroclus; they carry that love with them when the greeks seek revenge on troy. after nine years of assault on the city, achilles goes into a funk and withdraws from the battle when he decides that agamemnon, the greek king, has denied him his due spoils, a captured trojan slave girl. in achilles' absence, patroclus leads the greeks into battle, with tragic consequences. to avenge his loss and absolve his grief, achilles faces hector.
Title: achilles
